service.title: Blockchain Achievement Resume
service.description: Through its novel blockchain technology, TuringCerts is incorruptible, traceable, cost-effective, and borderless, which redefines traditional educational certificates to create a sustainable academic records tracking. TuringCerts guarantees the 100% control of data for users with a rigorous privacy policy and strengthens the highest trust of source and true value of official authorized certificates.

0.title: Fundamental Phase
0.content: TuringCerts in the fundamental phase are executed on the second generation blockchain - Ethereum, and are supervised and operated by multiple sophisticated Smart Contracts. IPFS is leveraged to parallelly keep huge-sizing digital images of certificates.

1.title: Advanced Stage
1.content: TuringCerts has reached a strategic collaboration with National Cheng Kung University and BiiLabs on technical infrastructures. TuringCerts is actively cooperating with the world-renowned IOTA Foundation for in-depth global adoptions. At this stage, TuringCerts will be migrated to the IOTA blockchain, with connection to the open source TangelID acceleration layer, in order to serve a extremely low commission fee and latency.

0.title: (1) How to ensure the uniqueness and authenticity?
0.content: TuringCerts adopts Decentralized Identifier Standard (DID) proposed by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C). TuringCerts serves each certificate holder with an unique identifier via a hash value to prevent tampering with. Its anti-counterfeiting feature is the cornerstone to a sustainable certificate ecosystem.

1.title: (2) How to upgrade privacy?
1.content: TuringCerts merges MIT Media Lab's early open-source certificate infrastructure - BlockCerts, and consider EU GDPR's Least Privilege Principle to  grants the verification party with the least but sufficient information. TuringCerts employs asymmetric encryption scheme such as RSA to guarantee high privacy for information transferral.

2.title: (3) How to make TuringCerts a global leader?
2.content: TuringCerts is afiliated with the Xccelerator of UC Berkeley Blockchain Lab, who will continue to absorb and integrate technical breakthroughs in the Silicon Valley, which maintains its impregnable security and adoptive application characteristics. TuringCerts will leverage its geographical advantage to conduct educational experiments in campuses of Hong Kong and Taiwan.

demo.title: The New Era of Resumes!
demo.description:
All certificates in one place.
 From academic achievement, competency certification, online courses, competition & awards, to all worth-noting records.
 TuringCerts improve the certification experience, ensuring the characteristics of anti-counterfeit, traceability, and minimized learning curve.
